resources.string: P.E.S - TOGO Sarl Solar Energy \nBd KARA not far from the pharmacy GBOSSIME \n03 BP 30986 Lome - Togo
PES-TOGO, Energie Solaire is specialised in :
Study and design of projects on solar energy:
Sale and installation of solar equipment

We are a new energy company installed in TOGO but we already exist in other states. \nWe know that it is from forms of energy such as solar, turbine and wind turbine that man manages to produce direct current alternating without leaving side effects harmful to our nature.
